metalign.beat.fromfile

Class FromFileBeatTrackingModelState

  • java.lang.Object
    • metalign.generic.MidiModelState
      • metalign.beat.BeatTrackingModelState
        • metalign.beat.fromfile.FromFileBeatTrackingModelState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<MidiModelState>

    public class FromFileBeatTrackingModelState
extends BeatTrackingModelState
    A FromFileBeatTrackingModelState generates a list of Beats, the one directly generated from the underlying MIDI. This is generated from the TimeTracker passed in through the constructor.
    Author:
    Andrew McLeod - 3 Sept, 2015

    • Field Summary

      The TimeTracker for this song.

    • Method Detail

      • getTatumsPerMeasure

        public int getTatumsPerMeasure()
        Description copied from class: BeatTrackingModelState
        Get the number of tacti which are present in each measure of the Beats of this state. This is needed because for a FromFileBeatTrackingModelState, the measures are incremented correctly, but for any other BeatTrackingModelState, this is not the case.
        Overrides:
        getTatumsPerMeasure in class BeatTrackingModelState
        Returns:
        The number of tacti per measure for a FromFileBeatTrackingModelState, or 0 for any other model.

      • getScore

        public double getScore()
        Description copied from class: MidiModelState
        Get the score of this MidiModelState. In general, a higher score reflects that a State is more likely given our prior knowledge. The natural ordering of MidiModelStates is based on this score value.
        Specified by:
        getScore in class MidiModelState
        Returns:
        The score of this MidiModelState.
